readable.title: 3718892835_a3e74a3417
readable.content: A boy falls off of his scooter during an obstacle course . A boy wearing a helmet flips up his scooter as he skates between orange cones . A person wearing a helmet begins to fall from a silver scooter . A woman is about to fall off a scooter . This person is falling off a scooter , in a parking lot .
